DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate two group-based Diabetes Prevention Program ( DPP ) lifestyle intervention deliver workplace individual risk pre-diabetes : 1 ) in-person group-based lifestyle intervention ; 2 ) internet-based intervention deliver use online platform lifestyle coach support . Eligible participant randomize equally intervention program ( 120 participant ) .
DOC.brief_title: Getting Balance : A Workplace Diabetes Prevention Intervention Trial
DOC.detailed_description: The study seek compare weight loss , change physical activity dietary fat intake , participant engagement two Diabetes Prevention Program ( DPP ) intervention derive Centers Disease Control Prevention ( CDC ) curriculum : in-person internet-based intervention program . We hypothesize internet-based intervention effective achieve weight loss in-person intervention , give convenience participant complete session therefore great potential engagement program .
DOC.criteria: Ethnicity : All ethnic group ; Sex : gender ; Age ( date enrollment ) : Lower age limit : 18 year ; Upper age limit : NONE ; Body mass index ≥ 25.0 kg/m2 ; ≥23 kg/m2 Asian Having prediabetes base score 9+ CDC prediabetes screener Able willing enroll provide write , informed consent , i.e. , : meet time data collection requirement study ; randomize one two intervention program ; adhere recommendation study intervention assign ; participate followup 12 month . Does work one participate employer work locations/departments ; Inability speak , read , understand English ; No regular access computer internet capability ; Diagnosis Type 1 Type 2 diabetes mellitus ; Systolic blood pressure ≥ 180 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure ≥ 100 mm Hg one occasion last year ; Having medical physical condition make moderate intensity physical activity ( like brisk walk ) difficult unsafe , exercise induce asthma chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) ; Use weightloss medication past 3 month ; Regular use ( > 5 days/month ) medication affect appetite weight ( e.g. , oral corticosteroid , insulin , oral hypoglycemics etc . ) ; Currently enrol weight loss program ; Planning undergo bariatric surgery study period ; Heart disease ( angina , heart attack ( myocardial infarction ) , congestive heart failure ( CHF ) ) , stroke ; Renal insufficiency ; Diagnosis cancer ( nonmelanoma skin cancer ) active treat radiation chemotherapy within past 2 year ; Pregnant , lactate plan become pregnant study period ; Already enrol plan enroll research study would limit full participation study confound observation interpretation study 's finding ; Planning transfer another department location study period ; Planning move area study period ; Investigator discretion clinical safety protocol adherence reason .
